entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early this evening. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 15 April 2023
